object.name: hotfix
object.property: <model xmlns="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/schema"> <schema> <field name="release_date" type="zope.schema.Datetime"> <description>Date the hotfix is released</description> <title>release date</title> </field> <field name="hotfix_version" type="zope.schema.Float"> <description>version of the hotfix</description> <title>Hotfix Version</title> </field> <field name="description" type="zope.schema.Text"> <description>Summary of hotfix contents</description> <title>Description</title> </field> <field name="product_name" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description>What product this Hot Fix applies to.</description> <required>False</required> <title>Product Name</title> </field> <field name="product_version" type="zope.schema.Float"> <description /> <required>False</required> <title>Product Version</title> </field> <field name="plone_version__s_" type="zope.schema.List"> <description>Two which version(s) of Plone should this hotfix be applied?</description> <title>Plone Version (s)</title> <value_type type="zope.schema.Choice"> <values> <element>4.3</element> <element>4.2</element> <element>4.1.2</element> <element>4.1.1</element> <element>4.1.0</element> <element>4.0.9</element> <element>4.0.8</element> <element>4.0.7</element> <element>4.0.6</element> <element>4.0.5</element> <element>4.0.4</element> <element>4.0.3</element> <element>4.0.2</element> <element>4.0.1</element> <element>4.0.0</element> <element>3.3.6</element> <element>3.3.5</element> <element>3.3.4</element> <element>3.3.3</element> <element>3.3.2</element> <element>3.3.1</element> <element>3.3.0</element> </values> </value_type> </field> <field name="zope_version" type="zope.schema.List"> <description>To which version(s) of Zope should this be applied?</description> <title>Zope Version</title> <value_type type="zope.schema.Choice"> <values> <element>2.13</element> <element>2.12</element> <element>2.11</element> <element>2.10</element> <element>2.9</element> <element>2.8</element> </values> </value_type> </field> <field name="mandatory" type="zope.schema.Bool"> <description>Is this a mandatory update?</description> <required>False</required> <title>Mandatory</title> </field> </schema> </model>
